verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'You shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H7126>present<s%> My <S%H7133>offering,<s%> My <S%H3899>food<s%> for My <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to Me, at their <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time.<s%>'

"And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H2088>'This<s%> is the <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> [as] a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> every <S%H3117>day.<s%>
'You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight;<s%>

also a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

'It is a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> which was <S%H6213>ordained<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Then the <S%H5262>libation<s%> with it [shall be] a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place you shall <S%H5258>pour<s%> out a <S%H5262>libation<s%> of <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight;<s%> as the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and as its <S%H5262>libation,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> it, an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> and two-tenths [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> as a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and its libation: <S%H5262><s%>

'[This is] the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H7676>every<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> in <S%H5921>addition<s%> to the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'Then at the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of each of your <S%H2320>months<s%> you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%>

and three-tenths [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H6499>bull;<s%> and two-tenths of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%>

and a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And their <S%H5262>libations<s%> shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H7992>third<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%> and a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for a <S%H3532>lamb;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of each <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

'And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> with its <S%H5262>libation<s%> in <S%H5921>addition<s%> to the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>
'Then on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be the Lord's <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

'And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [shall be] a <S%H2282>feast,<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> [shall be] <S%H398>eaten<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
'On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> [shall be] a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H1961>having<s%> them <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect.<s%>

'And for their grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> three-tenths [of an ephah] for a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and two-tenths for the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
'A <S%H6241>tenth<s%> [of an ephah] you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%>
and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you.

'You shall <S%H6213>present<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'After <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H428>manner<s%> you shall <S%H6213>present<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>presented<s%> with its <S%H5262>libation<s%> in <S%H5921>addition<s%> to the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

'Also on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits,<s%> when you <S%H7126>present<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in your [Feast of] <S%H7620>Weeks,<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%><S%H1121>,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> three-tenths [of an ephah] for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> two-tenths for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%>
a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you.

<S%H4480>'Besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>present<s%> [them] with their <S%H5262>libations.<s%> They shall be <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect.<s%>
